title: Record In-Process Quality Inspection
description: A quality inspector needs to record the results of an in-process inspection for a work order.

tasks.description: Identify the work order and the specific inspection plan associated with it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly selects the work order and brings up the required inspection checklist.

tasks.description: Enter the measurements and pass/fail results for each characteristic on the checklist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the data for all inspection points.

tasks.description: Submit the inspection results, noting that one measurement is out of specification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the results, which automatically flags the batch for non-conformance.
